zD.narrative: The agent moves down three times in a row, encounters a hint at position (0, 4), but does not take the hint. Then it moves up to its previous position.

zD_final.narrative: The agent moves down four times, encounters a hint (B), takes the hint without any reward, then moves up four times and turns right five times before reaching a position with a reward of 1.
